---
title: "PVS Program Pin"
output: html_document
---


```{r}

library(rocqi)
library(tidyr)


options(knitr.table.format = "html", cache = T) 
```

```{r}
pins::board_register_rsconnect(
  server = "https://rstudio-connect.chop.edu",
  account = "rybad",
  key = Sys.getenv("CONNECT_API_KEY")
  )
```

```{r}
pvs_df <- run_sql_file("sql.sql")

pvs_labs_df <- run_sql_file("pvs_lab_vars.sql")

pvs_caths_df <- run_sql_file("pvs_cath_vars.sql")

```


```{r}

pins::pin(
  x = pvs_df,
  name = "pulmonary_vein_stenosis_df",
  description = "Pulmonary Vein Stenosis Program data",
  board = "rsconnect"
)

pins::pin(
  x = pvs_labs_df,
  name = "pvs_labs_df",
  description = "Pulmonary Vein Stenosis Program Lab data",
  board = "rsconnect"
)

pins::pin(
  x = pvs_caths_df,
  name = "pvs_caths_df",
  description = "Pulmonary Vein Stenosis Program Cath data",
  board = "rsconnect"
)


```
